Reviews.Content: 1 property lost email sent wotif confirming booking luckily called advance reserve parking space discovered 2 actual location building website 300 metres 3 parking location shoddy difficult space reserved 4 tiny 5 service restaurant minibar 1 staff polite helpful 2 clean bed comfortable 3 position parramatta road advertised road walking distance king street newtown reason selecting property lack quality accommodation unfortunately based previous experiences rydges answer nor quest

Reviews.Title: “Filthy & unhygienic!”

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff, great apartment”

Reviews.Content: stayed quest road nights june family reserved studio apartment clean stylishly decorated quiet apartment faced laneway left building facing road staff friendly helpful check incheck easy parked car secure underground car park accessed laneway reserved car park advance arent additional charge studio apartment comfortable queen sized bed nice quality linens bed table chairs flat screen tv techno equipment didnt size built wardrobe spacious bathroom soothing colours quality towels balcony didnt sleep fresh air coming opposite bed kitchenette complete cutlery plates cooking utensils particularly short term stay microwave minbar stove cooktop kitchen sink studio didnt surprise nor bother didnt plan cook pay extra internet connection apartment free internet station lobby available staff duty morning til late night free local newspapers various tourist brochures available lobby daily sydney paper delivered door morning free charge bonus extra didnt expect glad location couple minutes walk hospital nearby medical facilities supermarket minute buy food items didnt guests brought own food items didnt spend time shopping pub serves meals 1012 close cafes 10 price range thai example maccas opposite ton cheap eats king st newtown venture 510 mins road transport city quest easy simply head left quest cross parramatta road buy bus ticket newsagent wait bus pretty regular service weekdays takes 10 mins depending conditions town hall city id definitely stay againbut tip book quality establishment close booked due popularity guests
